On Nov 18, 2003, at 8:33 AM, Chappell, Simon P wrote:

> Does the Junit FAQ have a list of suitable HTTP/HTML/Web testing tools 
> that can be used from within Junit?

No, but the junit.org site does have an "Extensions" page...

     http://www.junit.org/news/extension/index.htm

To keep the FAQ focused on JUnit, I didn't address any of the 
extensions for fear of it turning into a duplication of the 
"Extensions" page.  And at the time the FAQ was originally created, 
questions about web testing tools weren't all that frequent.  That 
being said, it is the JUnit FAQ, so if questions about JUnit extensions 
are being frequently asked here, then I'm all for expanding the scope 
to include those topics.

> Or, is the answer, "it will have if you send me one"? :-)

Naturally.  :-)

Mike
